name: Fast Sendy
author: FastFlow

sections.description:
Integrate Sendy autoresponder with Fast Member. Add your Fast Member members to a Sendy list whenever they make a purchase.

Get FastMember here

https://fastmember.com

Fast Sendy gives you a quick and easy way to add new FastMember customers to your Sendy email lists.

The moment anyone makes a purchase they will be added to the email list selected inside the Fast Member plugin.
sections.installation:
Upload through the WordPress dashboard or install direct from the repository. Once installed hit activate.

The Sendy options will appear inside each product on the Autoresponder settings tab.

Enter you Sendy installation URL ending with /subscribe/ and add the list ID from your Sendy installation
sections.faq:
Does this require another plugin to make this work?

Yes you will require Fast Member to add users to the membership products.
sections.changelog:
1.1.1

Full support for Fast Forms

1.1.0

Update for Fast Form action

1.0.7

  • Sanitized User inputs and added nonce.
  • Added restrictions for user roles.
  • Changed method for subscribing.

1.0.6

  • Initial version added to WordPress
